headline: Madison Sustainable Equity Fund Q4 2024 Investment Strategy Letter
summary: The S&P 500 ended 2024 with a 25% gain for the year. This marks the second consecutive year of gains exceeding 25% and the third such occurrence in the past four years.

raw.headline: Madison Sustainable Equity Fund Q4 2024 Investment Strategy Letter

headline: Ecolab Appoints Michel Doukeris to Board of Directors
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., February 20, 2025--The board of directors of Ecolab Inc. has appointed Michel Doukeris, Chief Executive Officer of AB InBev, to the Ecolab board as an independent director, effective February 20, 2025.

headline: Ecolab Declares Cash Dividend
summary: The board of directors of Ecolab Inc. today declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.65 per common share, to be paid April 15, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on March...
